atk-abh03a38:2_2: Tattha kāruññena vā ekena adhippāyena ekādhippāyo, saṁsāre vā ekato bhavissāmāti itthiyā saddhiṁ buddhapūjādīni katvā paṇidhivasena eko adhippāyo assāti ekādhippāyo.
atk-abh03a38:2_3: Evarūpo dvinnampi janānaṁ ekādhippāyo methuno dhammo paṭisevitabboti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānañceva vetullakānañca;
atk-abh03a38:2_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a38:5_2: Tattha iriyāpathasampanne ākappasampanne pāpabhikkhū disvā ‘‘arahantānaṁ vaṇṇena amanussā methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevantī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṁ uttarāpathakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a38:5_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a38:8_2: Chaddantajātakādīni sandhāya ‘‘bodhisatto issariyakāmakārikāhetu vinipātaṁ gacchati, gabbhaseyyaṁ okkamati, dukkarakārikaṁ akāsi, aparantapaṁ akāsi, aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddisī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a38:8_4: Dutiyakathāyaṁ iddhimāti yadi issariyakāmakārikāhetu gaccheyya, iddhiyā gaccheyya, na kammavasenāti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a38:8_5: Itaro pana paṭhamapañhe bhāvanāmayaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a38:8_7: Tatiyakathāyaṁ issariyakāmakārikāhetu nāma dukkarakārikā micchādiṭṭhiyā kariyati.
atk-abh03a38:8_8: Yadi ca so taṁ kareyya, sassatādīnipi gaṇheyyāti codanatthaṁ sassato lokotiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a38:11_2: Tattha mettākaruṇāmuditāyo sandhāya ‘‘na rāgo rāgapatirūpako’’ti ca issāmacchariyakukkuccāni sandhāya ‘‘na doso dosapatirūpako’’ti ca hasituppādaṁ sandhāya ‘‘na moho mohapatirūpako’’ti ca dummaṅkūnaṁ puggalānaṁ niggahaṁ pesalānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anuggahaṁ pāpagarahitaṁ kalyāṇapasaṁsaṁ āyasmato pilindavacchassa vasalavādaṁ bhagavato kheḷāsakavādaṁ moghapurisavādañca sandhāya ‘‘na kileso kilesapatirūpako’’ti ca yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a38:11_3: te sandhāya sabbakathāsu pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a38:11_4: Atha naṁ yasmā phassādipatirūpakā naphassādayo nāma natthi, tasmā rāgādipatirūpakā narāgādayopi natthīti codetuṁ atthi na phassotiādimāha .
atk-abh03a38:15_0: ‘‘Dukkhameva hi sambhoti, dukkhaṁ tiṭṭhati veti ca;
atk-abh03a38:16_0: Nāññatra dukkhā sambhoti, nāññaṁ dukkhā nirujjhatī’’ti. (saṁ. ni. 1.171) –
atk-abh03a38:17_0: Vacanaṁ nissāya dukkhaññeva parinipphannaṁ, sesā khandhāyatanadhātuindriyadhammā aparinipphannāti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṁ uttarapathakānañceva hetuvādānañca;
atk-abh03a38:17_1: te sandhāya rūpaṁ aparinipphannanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a38:17_2: Atha naṁ ‘‘sace rūpaṁ aparinipphannaṁ, na aniccādisabhāvaṁ siyā’’ti codetuṁ rūpaṁ na aniccantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a38:17_4: Sakavādī nanu rūpaṁ aniccantiādi vacanena tassa ekaṁ laddhiṁ paṭisedhetvā dutiyaṁ pucchanto dukkhaññeva parinipphannantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a38:17_5: Athassa tampi laddhiṁ paṭisedhetuṁ na yadaniccantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a38:17_6: Tatrāyaṁ adhippāyo – na kevalañhi paṭhamasaccameva dukkhaṁ.
atk-abh03a38:17_7: Yaṁ pana kiñci aniccaṁ, taṁ dukkhameva.
atk-abh03a38:17_9: Iti yaṁ tvaṁ vadesi ‘‘rūpaṁ aparinipphannaṁ, dukkhaññeva parinipphanna’’nti, taṁ no vata re vattabbe ‘‘dukkhaññeva parinipphanna’’nti.
atk-abh03a38:17_11: Dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu pana ṭhapetvā nibbānaṁ sesadhammānaṁ vasena aniccatā veditabbā. Indriyāni aniccānevāti.
atk-abh03a38:22_0: Paṇṇāsakehi catūhi, tīhi vaggehi ceva ca;
atk-abh03a38:25_0: Yaṁ jino desayi tassa, niṭṭhitā atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-abh03a38:28_0: Yaṁ pattaṁ kusalaṁ tena, lokoyaṁ sanarāmaro;
